name: datasets
description: datasets is a command-line tool that is used to query and download biological sequence data across all domains of life from NCBI databases

options.description: Specify an NCBI API key
Emit debugging info
Print detailed help about a datasets command
Print version of datasets

subcommands.name: summary
subcommands.description: Print a data report containing gene, genome, taxonomy or virus metadata
subcommands.usage:
datasets summary genome accession GCF_000001405.40
datasets summary genome taxon "mus musculus"
datasets summary gene gene-id 672
datasets summary gene symbol brca1 --taxon "mus musculus"
datasets summary gene accession NP_000483.3
datasets summary taxonomy taxon "mus musculus"
datasets summary virus genome accession NC_045512.2
datasets summary virus genome taxon sars-cov-2 --host dog

options.description: Specify an NCBI API key
Emit debugging info
Print detailed help about a datasets command
Print version of datasets

subcommands.name: gene
subcommands.description: Print a summary of a gene dataset
subcommands.usage:
datasets summary gene gene-id 672
datasets summary gene symbol brca1 --taxon mouse
datasets summary gene accession NP_000483.3

options.description: Stream results as newline delimited JSON-Lines
Limit the number of gene summaries returned (default "all")
Choose the output type
Specify an NCBI API key
Emit debugging info
Print detailed help about a datasets command
Print version of datasets

subcommands.name: gene-id
subcommands.description: Print a data report containing gene metadata by NCBI Gene ID
subcommands.usage: datasets summary gene gene-id <gene-id ...> [flags]

options.description: Read a list of NCBI Gene IDs from a file to use as input
Retrieves data for an ortholog set. Provide one or more taxa (any rank) to filter results or 'all' for the complete set.
Specify an NCBI API key
Stream results as newline delimited JSON-Lines
Emit debugging info
Print detailed help about a datasets command
Limit the number of gene summaries returned
Choose the output type:
Print version of datasets

subcommands.name: symbol
subcommands.description: Print a data report containing gene metadata by gene symbol
subcommands.usage:
datasets summary gene symbol tp53
datasets summary gene symbol brca1 --taxon mouse

options.description: Read a list of NCBI Gene Symbols from a file to use as input
Retrieves data for an ortholog set. Provide one or more taxa (any rank) to filter results or 'all' for the complete set.
Define species (NCBI taxid, common or scientific name) for gene symbol (default "human")
Specify an NCBI API key
Stream results as newline delimited JSON-Lines
Emit debugging info
Print detailed help about a datasets command
Limit the number of gene summaries returned
Choose the output type:
Print version of datasets

options.description: Read a list of NCBI Gene Accessions from a file to use as input

options.description: Specify an NCBI API key
Stream results as newline delimited JSON-Lines

subcommands.name: locus-tag
subcommands.description: Print a data report containing gene metadata by locus tag
subcommands.usage:
datasets summary gene locus-tag b0001
datasets summary gene locus-tag b0001 ArthCt125

options.description: Read a list of NCBI Gene Locus Tags from a file to use as input
Retrieves data for an ortholog set. Provide one or more taxa (any rank, limited to vertebrates and insects) to filter results or 'all' for the complete set.

subcommands.name: genome
subcommands.description: Print a data report containing genome metadata
subcommands.usage:
datasets summary genome accession GCF_000001405.40
datasets summary genome taxon mouse
datasets summary genome taxon human --assembly-level chromosome,complete
datasets summary genome taxon mouse --search C57BL/6J --search "Broad Institute"

options.description: Limit to annotated genomes
Output results in JSON Lines format
Limit to genomes at one or more assembly levels (comma-separated):
Limit to 'RefSeq' (GCF_) or 'GenBank' (GCA_) genomes (default "all")
Exclude atypical assemblies
Limit the number of genome summaries returned
Limit to metagenome assembled genomes (only) or remove them from the results (exclude) (default "all")
Limit to reference genomes
Limit to genomes released on or after a specified date (MM/DD/YYYY)
Limit to genomes released on or before a specified date (MM/DD/YYYY)
Choose the output type:
Limit results to genomes with specified text in the searchable fields: species and infraspecies, assembly name and submitter. To search multiple strings, use the flag multiple times.
Specify an NCBI API key
Emit debugging info

Print version of datasets

subcommands.name: taxon
subcommands.description: Print a data report containing taxonomy metadata by taxon (NCBI Taxonomy ID, scientific or common name at any tax rank)

subcommands.name: download
subcommands.description: Download a gene, genome or virus dataset as a zip file
subcommands.usage:
datasets download genome accession GCF_000001405.40 --chromosomes X,Y --exclude-gff3 --exclude-rna
datasets download genome taxon "bos taurus"
datasets download gene gene-id 672
datasets download gene symbol brca1 --taxon "mus musculus"
datasets download gene accession NP_000483.3
datasets download taxonomy taxon human,sars-cov-2
datasets download virus genome taxon sars-cov-2 --host dog
datasets download virus protein S --host dog --filename SARS2-spike-dog.zip

options.description: Specify a custom file name for the downloaded data package (default "ncbi_dataset.zip")
Hide progress bar
Specify an NCBI API key
Emit debugging info
Print detailed help about a datasets command
Print version of datasets
